name: PUBG LITE: Lite
description:
PUBG LITE: Lite from the RetardMűhely 2k18
They took our beloved PUBG LITE, but we remade a cheaper version of it, this time this is really LITE!!!

The game is under development, updates and new features coming soon, including more levels, guns, etc...

The first official version of the game just released (V1.0) 
This updade includes some new stuffs and bug fixes. 
Menu music added to the main menu of the game, 2 new weapons added (SCAR-L, M24)

Miramar added, so now you can choose between 2 levels (Erangel, Miramar) by clicking the level changer button above the start button.

Updates will coming soon. Have a nice day!
